parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if given unit is turned out, otherwise [[false]]. The output changes to [[true]] after unit finished turning out, however will change to [[false]] almost immediately after unit is ordered to turn in.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isTurnedOut''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit on turn(in/out) enabled turret
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_commanderOut = [[isTurnedOut]] (tank [[turretUnit]] [0,0]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[moveOut]], [[moveInDriver]], [[turretUnit]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
